mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GameContents(id, userId, title, subscribeDate, gameLevel, maxSubscribers, content, createdat, price, discountRate, discountPrice) VALUES (GAMECONTENTS_ID_SEQ.nextval, 1, #{title}, #{subscribeDate}, #{gameLevel}, #{maxSubscribers}, #{content}, sysdate, #{price}, #{discountRate}, #{discountPrice} )
